name: Yellow Rope Hero
description:
Come play Yellow Hero Game and enjoy the first-rate, smooth animations as heroes swing freely through the Gangster Crime city like never before.

Funny Yellow Hero Game - Flying in the air using a rope at every point
- Hero fight as a savor of your futuristic city not for yourself in a battle zone
- Show your Hero shooting skills and stop all the villains standing in your way
- Funny Grand City Hero defeat enemies and stop their illegal activities from the grand street city
- Mafia gangsters using your city-building climbing styles
- Grand city makes you run like a hero in the Swing Hero Grand City Game
- In gangster, vegas superpower can save the people
- Superhero combat skills in this alliance battle
- Rope hero fights against the incredible mutants who are destroying the buildings and offices

Flying Yellow heroes are fighting in your support, you are everyone's hope and they are calling you my amazing rope hero, show some super villain stealthy action for the survival of your futuristic grand city and make it secure.
